Name: Mr. Mower
About the game: Mr. Mower is a challenging top-down lawnmowing simulator with a focus on avoiding obstacles as you mow your way through various lawns. You are a lawnmower created by Hane, who is hoping to create her first successful project, help her accomplish her goal by becoming the best mower you can be. Features - Challenging top down movement where every second counts towards mowing lawns and not taking a hit - An array of obstacles designed to put your mowing skills to the test. - Extra challenge in the form of a collectable flower found throughout each lawn.
